name: Techni Jump
description:
TECHNI JUMP

It's an infinite runner with procedurally generated platforms. Each platform has its own colour, which can be really helpful with learning patterns and mastering the game. Moreover, the simple highlight indicates which platform will fall, so you can be sure, that every platform will be in their place! There's a chasing laser included, so you need to be very fast, but be sure spikes can and will slow you down.
Colour palette is based on Technicolor's hues, that's also where did the name come from.
Enjoy our very first game, and good luck, have fun!

Controls:

  • Press Up Arrow while standing on the ground to jump.
    Longer you hold it, the higher you jump.
  • Press Down Arrow when in the air to rapidly dash downwards.
    But be careful, this can really let you down.

Features:

  • Pseudorandomly generated infinite level,
  • Deadly chasing laser,
  • Colour coded platform layouts,
  • Original 8-bit music and Sound Effects,
  • Buttons to mute that beautiful sounds.

Credits:

All resources are made by us using free software.
We were doing this for the first time, and we'd like to hear your feedback out :)

Special thanks to lazarow for teaching and mentoring.
This game wouldn't be made without you.
